SEARCH
Package dao

Class AdminDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.BaseDAO
dao.AdminDAO
public class AdminDAO extends BaseDAO
AdminDAO handles admin-related database operations including authentication, adding admins, and managing users. Provides methods for admin login, retrieval, addition, and user management.
Since:
2025
Version:
1.0
Author:
khadeja and masa

      public boolean login(String username, String email)
      Authenticates an admin using username and email.

      username - the admin's username
      email - the admin's email
      Returns:
      true if admin exists with the given credentials, false otherwise
